description:
Take a new look at Lookin. The most iconic bike saddle in the Selle Royal range, Lookin puts comfort on display with a unique design featuring windows on the saddle’s surface that reveal the supportive Royalgel padding hiding inside. This saddle is tailored to those who typically sit at a more upright (60-degree) spine angle.

  • Royalgel™ provides the highest level of comfort. Durable and versatile, this technology absorbs pressure and distributes it across the saddle surface, ensuring the best support for even your longest rides
  • The innovative cool cover reflects UV rays to keep rides fresh while lateral inserts protect the saddle from accidental abrasions
  • Enjoy a dry ride with a water-resistant saddle. This patented Selle Royal technology allows the saddle to be 100% sealed and substantially waterproof, even when exposed to heavy, wet weather
  • Say no to scuffed saddle sides and lean your bike against anything in total freedom. The extra protective inserts applied to the sides of the saddle increase resistance against impacts and abrasions
  • The integrated clip system positioned at the rear of the saddle will make the attachment of a Selle Royal saddle bag or other accessories an easy clip away
name: Selle Royal Lookin Moderate Saddle - Unisex
